official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the deduction from benefits with respect to blood provided an individual which is not replaced.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the deduction from payments to providers of health services for unreplaced blood and provides for payment to providers of health services for processing fees incurred in the replacement of blood.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the deduction from benefits with respect to blood provided an individual which is not replaced.
